name: Intergalactic Taxi Co. Demo
description:
Intergalactic Taxi Co. is a casual puzzle game about picking up and dropping off passengers across a colorful, low-poly galaxy. Plan your route carefully to avoid running out of fuel and get everyone where they need to be!

Please note that this is an unfinished build of the game; it still lacks any sounds or music, UI elements are likely to change, and many more mechanics and levels will still be added.
